lines.text: Bless me father... for I have sinned...

[On the phone to Meagan]
It's in the hands of the Lord now.

[praying]
I'm your strength... and I'll deliver their souls onto you.

[showing Colin, Jonas in his room]
In there is Father Jonas. The Devil has taken him... He is beyond saving.
Pussy, pussy, I'm gonna get me some pussy.

[Praying]
Holy Father help me save the sluts and the whores.

[Written on a note]
"I've gone to see if I can awaken Father Jonas."
Shut up and take off your pants.
